Position Overview We are currently seeking a Category Analyst with strong project management, analytical and product management skills. Reporting to the Category Project Manager, this position will interact with all aspects of the Commercial and Industrial sales team, purchasing and cross-functional team. The primary responsibility of this position is to lead primary tasks/projects on key sales programs and work closely with sales and category leadership to develop reporting and business analytic tools. Responsibilities Include:Work on projects supporting gross margin cost improvements, financial analysis on key business issues, and reporting.With direction from the Category Project Manager, drive system enhancements and user training relating to category management projects.Maintain project plan and key milestones to ensure timeline and budget achievement.Responsible for identifying, interpreting and analyzing trends to achieve company’s business goals.Develop reporting capabilities and monitor system to identify areas of improvement for sales and category teams.The ideal candidate will have:2-5 years experience in business analytics, change management and/or process improvement.Proven working experience as a data analyst or business data analyst.Ability to conduct cost and benefit analysis.Advanced Microsoft application experience.Excellent verbal and written communication skills.Ability to prioritize and manage multiple assignments and meet tight deadlines.
